name: Wigglytuff
description: When it gets angry, it inhales with all its might, and its body gradually inflates. Sometimes they can grow 20 times larger!

attacks.name: Sleep Pulse
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Double Smash
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 90 damage for each heads.
